tool_description: Validates voice synthesis parameters for compatibility and feasibility, ensuring realistic voice characteristics combinations.

age_range.description: Age category: child, young_adult, adult, elderly

voice_texture.description: Voice texture: smooth, rough, breathy, clear

error_messages: Pitch-gender mismatch: Ensure pitch range is appropriate for selected gender (male: 85-180Hz, female: 165-265Hz).
Invalid age-pitch combination: Verify pitch matches age range expectations.
Unsupported parameter value: Use valid options for voice_gender, age_range, and voice_texture.
Unrealistic voice characteristics: The combination of parameters may not produce natural-sounding speech.
usage: Provide target pitch, gender, age range, and optionally voice texture. The tool validates parameter compatibility for realistic voice synthesis.
